reviewText: This was worth the purchase. I can't begin to express how good this movie was. I can't wait to purchase more in the future.

The video starts with a small montage of Michael Crowe on his photoshoots. Then we see Michael in his hotel room laying down on the bed naked, then we see Michael touching himself sexual. Then the words "Imagine Yourself..." come up on the screen. Then Michael plays with his penis. Then the words "Play with me..." come up. Then we see Michael taking a shower, then he starts to touching himself sexual again and play with his penis in the shower. Then the words "Be with me.." and "Release" come up. Then saying "Pleasure... One's preference or wish: What is your pleasure?" Then show shots of Michael as he is laying in bed playing with his penis behind the covers. Then the camera moves up to his face and he turns his head and looks into the camera. THE END

Overall the DVD isn't bad!
I just wished Michael Crowe did a lot more and the video was longer!

The DVD is about 15 minutes long.

This DVD is superior in quality. Well worth the price paid and Michael is very good at teasing the camera and showing off all his assets. If you are a fan of Michael Crowe, you won't be dissapointed. There is also a nice interview giving you insight to his character.
